mapper.select: SELECT e.id ,e.status,e.result,date_format(e.date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') date,e.TransID ,c.name as counterName from events e LEFT JOIN counters c ON e.RegID=c.id LEFT JOIN shops s ON c.shopId=s.id LEFT JOIN areas a ON s.areaId=a.id where s.areaId=#{areaID} and date_format(e.date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
